@@ @@

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fragment:fandation-0/fandation.png style="margin:2rem 0"]]

[[div class="searchbox"]]
Search the world's largest wiki
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
+ Announcement
[[/=]]

Hello, everyone. It's with a heavy heart that we will be announcing the closure of this wiki. Due to the actions of a persistent group of bad actors, believed to be Gamers Against Weed, and a general loss of interest in the setting, the remaining members of the team believe it best to end things before they continue to get worse. Apologies, once again, and have a good day/afternoon/night.

[[/div]]

[[span style="font-size:20px;color:#3a3a3a;font-weight:bold;"]]9 comments[[/span]]
